short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add extra features to GiantBomb.com to enhance your viewing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Only feature for now is adding a PiP button to Giant Bomb videos that use the GB Player (i.e. not YouTube videos, you can get PiP by right clicking twice in those).

New features will come in the future.
